Pypergraph¶

This is the main page of the Pypergraph documentation.

Installation¶

To install Pypergraph, run the following commands:

  1. Clone the repository:

git clone https://github.com/buzzgreyday/pypergraph cd pypergraph

  1. Create a virtual environment:

python -m venv venv

  1. Activate the virtual environment:

  • Linux/MacOS: ` source venv/bin/activate `

  • Windows: ` .\venv\Scripts\activate `

  1. Install dependencies:

pip install -r requirements.txt

Usage¶

Here’s an example of how to use Pypergraph:

```python import pypergraph

# Your code goes here

pypergraph
